data.prayer: Father, help your children in Šibensko-Kninska, Croatia find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Šibensko-Kninska, Croatia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 103,700 souls living in the state of Šibensko-Kninska with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 237 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Šibensko-Kninska, Croatia to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 437 believers in Šibensko-Kninska to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Jew, Croatian-speaking people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Jew, Croatian-speaking people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Jew, Croatian-speaking people is yours.
Lord, the believers in the state of Šibensko-Kninska, Croatia need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Šibensko-Kninska. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Šibensko-Kninska, Croatia that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.
